name: .FIL File Extension
summary: Learn about .FIL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can import a FIL file into ACL for Windows to view the data it contains. Note that you must also import or create an associated table layout to view the data your FIL file contains.

If your FIL file is stored within an ACL project you have access to, it may be easier to import the FIL file's data using the Copy from another Project â†’ Table... option available in ACL. To access this option, right-click your current project's name in the ACL navigation bar.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
